item.title: Makani numbers in Dubai assist taxi drivers in locating their customers
item.description:
Source: RTA. Dubai taxis are now connected to the city through the Makani system. Dubai’s Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) Public Transport Agency has successfully connected 4,500 taxis operated by franchise companies to the Dubai Municipality’s Makani System. This system utilizes unique coordinates, known as Makani numbers, for precise building location. Adel Shakri, Director of Transportation Systems at RTA’s Public Transport Agency, highlighted the significant role of the Makani System...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/makani-numbers-in-dubai-assist-taxi-drivers-in-locating-their-customers/

item.title: Positioning your company in the southwest corner of the office could enhance its success
item.description:
Source: Joey Yap Private Limited. Infographic on the impact of directions in 2018. In fengshui, different directions are believed to influence different aspects of a person’s life, and these influences shift each lunar year...
